Posts.EditableText: I want to have a score that determines a player's rank. I want the score to be hidden though, so they can only see their rank and not their number score. How could I hide this? Or is there an alternative way to make a number that can influence scripts.
Posts.HTML: I want to have a score that determines a player's rank. I want the score to be hidden though, so they can only see their rank and not their number score. How could I hide this? Or is there an alternative way to make a number that can influence scripts.

Posts.EditableText: Just untick "Score" from the _features_ tab of the game, and somewhere (the game start script probably), set game.score to zero.
Posts.HTML: Just untick "Score" from the features tab of the game, and somewhere (the game start script probably), set game.score to zero.
